it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.player

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockPlayer, PlayerImpl

    public interface Player
    Implementers behave like a playing character in an Adrenaline game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addScore(int points)
      Gives the given points to the player.
      void addSkull()
      Add skull on killtrack.
      void assignFirstPlayerCard()
      Gives the first player card to this player.
      boolean canReload()
      Verifies if this player is eligible for a reload action
      boolean diedThisTurn()
      Checks if the player died this turn and should assign score for their death.
      void drawCard()
      Makes the player draw a new power up card from the game's power up deck.
      PlayerData generatePlayerData()
      Generates a new snapshot of this Player's state
      ActionBoard getActionBoard()
      Returns the action board owned by this player.
      PlayerColor getColor()
      Returns the player's color.
      DamageBoard getDamageBoard()
      Returns the damage board owned by this player.
      int getDamageFromPlayer(Player player)
      Returns the total damage that this player received from the given player since their (re)spawn.
      Player getDamager(int cell)
      Identifies the player that dealt the cell-th damage to this player.
      int getDeaths()
      Returns the number of times this player died.
      Game getGame()
      Returns the game this player is playing in.
      PlayerInventory getInventory()
      Returns a PlayerInventory object describing the player's inventory, containing all of their resources.
      PlayerListener getListener()
      Retrieves the listener associated with this Player
      int getMarksFromPlayer(Player player)
      Returns the total number of marks that this player received from the given player.
      java.util.List<ActionFactory> getMoves()
      Retrieves a list of all the legal actions this player can take at the time of invocation.
      int getMovesAmount()
      Retrieves the amount of actions that can be performed this turn
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the user associated to this player.
      int getScore()
      Returns the total score this player currently has.
      int getScoreForPlayer(Player player)
      Used to calculate the score after death of current player.
      Tile getTile()
      Returns the tile this player is located in, or null if the player is out of the map.
      int getTotalDamage()
      Returns the number of damage this player currently has.
      void goFrenzy(boolean precedesFirstPlayer)
      Method used when going frenzy.
      boolean hasFirstPlayerCard()
      Returns whether this player has the first player card, and therefore whether they are the first player that needs to make their move.
      void init()
      Initializes this player.
      boolean isActionBoardFrenzy()
      Checks whether this player's action board is in any Frenzy state.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns whether this player has an open connection.
      boolean isDead()
      Returns whether the player is dead in the way that the game Adrenaline means death.
      void registerDamageBoard(DamageBoard damageBoard)
      Bind a DamageBoard to this player Note that if a previous damage board was set, its listener will be passed to the new damage board.
      void reportDeath(boolean isDead)
      Used to report death and allow resurrection with Undo.
      void resetTurnDeath()
      Notifies the model object that the scores have been assigned for their death.

      Assigns the given PlayerListener to this player
      void setTile(Tile dest)
      Sets the this player's location to the given tile.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Initializes this player. This player's new inventory, damage and action boards are created.

      • getGame

        Game getGame()
        Returns the game this player is playing in.
        Returns:
        the Game this player belongs to

      • getListener

        PlayerListener getListener()
        Retrieves the listener associated with this Player
        Returns:
        this Player's listener

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the user associated to this player.
        Returns:
        name

      • getTile

        Tile getTile()
        Returns the tile this player is located in, or null if the player is out of the map.
        Returns:
        this player's Tile

      • setTile

        void setTile(Tile dest)
        Sets the this player's location to the given tile.
        Parameters:
        dest - this player's new location

      • getInventory

        PlayerInventory getInventory()
        Returns a PlayerInventory object describing the player's inventory, containing all of their resources.
        Returns:
        this player's PlayerInventory object. USe with care.

      • getColor

        PlayerColor getColor()
        Returns the player's color.
        Returns:
        this Player's color

      • getMoves

        java.util.List<ActionFactory> getMoves()
        Retrieves a list of all the legal actions this player can take at the time of invocation. This depends on powerups in inventory, action boards' state, damage taken.
        Returns:
        List of actions this player may perform

      • getMovesAmount

        int getMovesAmount()
        Retrieves the amount of actions that can be performed this turn
        Returns:
        amount of actions that can be performed this turn

      • getDeaths

        int getDeaths()
        Returns the number of times this player died.
        Returns:
        number of deaths

      • getTotalDamage

        int getTotalDamage()
        Returns the number of damage this player currently has.
        Returns:
        total damage taken

      • getDamager

        Player getDamager(int cell)
        Identifies the player that dealt the cell-th damage to this player.
        Parameters:
        cell - the index of the cell. Between 0 and 11 inclusive.
        Returns:
        player who dealt the damage. Can be null.

      • getDamageFromPlayer

        int getDamageFromPlayer(Player player)
        Returns the total damage that this player received from the given player since their (re)spawn.
        Returns:
        amount of damage taken

      • getMarksFromPlayer

        int getMarksFromPlayer(Player player)
        Returns the total number of marks that this player received from the given player.
        Returns:
        amount of marks taken

      • isDead

        boolean isDead()
        Returns whether the player is dead in the way that the game Adrenaline means death.
        Returns:
        is this dead

      • registerDamageBoard

        void registerDamageBoard(DamageBoard damageBoard)
        Bind a DamageBoard to this player Note that if a previous damage board was set, its listener will be passed to the new damage board.
        Parameters:
        damageBoard - the board to register.

      • goFrenzy

        void goFrenzy(boolean precedesFirstPlayer)
        Method used when going frenzy.
        Parameters:
        precedesFirstPlayer - whether the current player is before or after the first player in the frenzy turn.

      • getScoreForPlayer

        int getScoreForPlayer(Player player)
        Used to calculate the score after death of current player.
        Parameters:
        player - to calculate the score of.
        Returns:
        the score to add to player based on the damage done to this.

      • assignFirstPlayerCard

        void assignFirstPlayerCard()
        Gives the first player card to this player.

      • hasFirstPlayerCard

        boolean hasFirstPlayerCard()
        Returns whether this player has the first player card, and therefore whether they are the first player that needs to make their move.
        Returns:
        does this player have the first player card

      • addScore

        void addScore(int points)
        Gives the given points to the player.
        Parameters:
        points - to add to this player's score

      • getScore

        int getScore()
        Returns the total score this player currently has.
        Returns:
        current score

      • setListener

        void setListener(PlayerListener listener)
        Assigns the given PlayerListener to this player
        Parameters:
        listener - to assign to this player

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns whether this player has an open connection.
        Returns:
        does this user have an open connection

      • drawCard

        void drawCard()
        Makes the player draw a new power up card from the game's power up deck.

      • getDamageBoard

        DamageBoard getDamageBoard()
        Returns the damage board owned by this player.
        See Also:
        for further information.

      • getActionBoard

        ActionBoard getActionBoard()
        Returns the action board owned by this player.
        See Also:
        for further information

      • reportDeath

        void reportDeath(boolean isDead)
        Used to report death and allow resurrection with Undo.
        Parameters:
        isDead - death status of this player

      • addSkull

        void addSkull()
        Add skull on killtrack.

      • isActionBoardFrenzy

        boolean isActionBoardFrenzy()
        Checks whether this player's action board is in any Frenzy state.
        Returns:
        is this player's action board frenzy

      • generatePlayerData

        PlayerData generatePlayerData()
        Generates a new snapshot of this Player's state
        Returns:
        current player state to be sent to the listener.

      • canReload

        boolean canReload()
        Verifies if this player is eligible for a reload action
        Returns:
        is this player eligible for a reload action

      • diedThisTurn

        boolean diedThisTurn()
        Checks if the player died this turn and should assign score for their death.
        Returns:
        did this player die this turn, or has this player's damage board been scored

      • resetTurnDeath

        void resetTurnDeath()
        Notifies the model object that the scores have been assigned for their death.
